creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: short, squat four-cornered basket tapering to narrower top with round opening; sides curve outward; handle formed from two bamboo branches that match the width of the basket; secured at top center with three decorative knots; open, crisscross weave with relatively wide bamboo strips; center flower cylinder dark lacquered bamboo
marks: Signature on side, near handle base: [ 峰斎作 ] {Hōsai saku}
title: Flower basket
